text: Adam Papalia is an Australian sports commentator for Fox Sports and radio station 6PR. Papalia has covered an average of 60 games a season calling the NBL, A-League and the AFL, after completing a sports broadcasting course at Edith Cowan University. In 2016, he joined the Fox Footy broadcast team, commentating a game each Saturday, and sometimes on Sunday if there is a game played in Perth. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Australian rules football commentators Category:People from Perth, Western Australia
title: Adam Papalia
